name: Live Connect
desc: The Interactive Live SDK is an interactive tool for exploring the Live Connect APIs and learning how they can enrich your application without having to do any coding! This tool allows you to try out the APIs without having registered a Live application.

values.wl.skydrive_update: write to files you've stored in SkyDrive
values.wl.contacts_create: add new contacts to your address book
values.wl.messenger: chat with your contacts using Live Messenger
values.wl.applications: access the client IDs you use to interact with Live services
values.wl.work_profile: read your employer and work position information
values.wl.contacts_skydrive: read files your contacts have shared with you
values.wl.skydrive: read files you've stored in SkyDrive
values.wl.contacts_photos: read your contacts' photos and other media
values.wl.basic: read your basic info and contacts
values.wl.events_create: create events on your default calendar
values.wl.calendars_update: write to your calendars and events
values.wl.offline_access: access your information while you're not logged in
values.wl.photos: read your photos and other media
values.wl.applications_create: create new client IDs to interact with Live services
